full_text: A timeless raglan cardigan with a clean, fitted shape that sits at the hip. Worked top-down in stockinette stitch with ribbed edges, this pattern is beginner-friendly and a perfect entry point for those new to knitting garments. This design was created by Meredith Adams for Utopia Crafts using our Re-Cotton DK yarn, a sustainable blend of 80% recycled cotton and 20% recycled polyester - soft, breathable, and ideal for everyday wear. Sizes available: UK - M, L, XL Yarn Requirements: 200g of Re-Cotton Light Pink (2,2,2 balls) 100g (M), 200g (L), 200g (XL) of Re-Cotton Pumpkin Orange (1,2,2 balls) 100g (M), 200g (L), 200g (XL) of Re-Cotton White (1,2,2 balls) 100g (M), 200g (L), 200g (XL) of Re-Cotton Dark Indigo (1,2,2 balls)
name: Ravelry: The Solstice Cardigan pattern by Utopia Crafts
